## Affiliate Signup:
We pay 25% commissions for every order placed using your custom affiliate link by tracking visitors you refer to us using a cookie. The cookie will last up to 180 days following the initial visit, so you will get a commission for the referral even if they do not sign up immediately. If you have any questions, please contact us, or sign up by clicking the button below.

**Offer: $10 Affiliate Bonus for each VPS paid annually (LXC-1G_Special excluded - offer valid till 1 Jan 2022)**

**Signup > https://my.hostcram.com/order/main/index/register**


**Limited stock available.** Each order will be reviewed manually. All questions are answerable via [support ticket](https://my.hostcram.com/dashboard/plugin/support_managerpro/client_tickets/departments/ "support ticket") and [live chat](https://www.hostcram.com/ "live chat"). Don't forget to read our [TOS](https://www.hostcram.com/tos "TOS"), [AUP](https://www.hostcram.com/aup "AUP") & [Privacy Policy](https://www.hostcram.com/privacy-policy "Privacy Policy") before signing up.
